activities.name: Outdoor Basketball Coaching
activities.description: Teach her the basics or play HORSE at a sunny outdoor court.

activities.name: Indoor Basketball Session
activities.description: Book a court and keep the energy up even if it's raining.

activities.name: Arcade Challenge at B. Lucky & Sons
activities.description: Play retro games, win tickets, and flirt over air hockey.

activities.name: Fortress Sydney Game Lounge
activities.description: Board games, arcade machines, and chill booths for rainy-day fun.

activities.name: Kirribilli Farmers Market
activities.description: Wander through fresh produce and artisan stalls on a sunny morning.

activities.name: Newtown Vintage Hunt
activities.description: Find quirky treasures and challenge each other to weird-item missions.

activities.name: Edition Roasters (Darling Square)
activities.description: Moody Japanese-inspired café perfect for rainy-day chats.

activities.name: Azuki Bakery
activities.description: Japanese bakery known for their curry pan

activities.name: Barangaroo Reserve Walk
activities.description: Harbour views and shaded paths for a scenic stroll.

activities.name: Wendy's Secret Garden
activities.description: Hidden greenery and winding paths for quiet connection.

activities.name: Carriageworks Farmers Market
activities.description: Explore fresh produce, artisan foods, and local crafts in a vibrant setting.

activities.name: Glebe Markets
activities.description: Hunt for vintage clothes, handmade jewelry, and enjoy live music.

activities.name: The Grounds of Alexandria
activities.description: Lush gardens, great coffee, and delicious brunch options.

activities.name: Single O (Surry Hills)
activities.description: Trendy spot for specialty coffee and people-watching.

activities.name: Cuckoo Callay (Newtown)
activities.description: Funky café with creative brunch dishes and a fun vibe.

activities.name: Coogee to Bondi Coastal Walk
activities.description: Iconic clifftop walk with stunning ocean views and beaches along the way.

activities.name: Royal Botanic Garden Sydney
activities.description: Wander through themed gardens and enjoy harbour views.

activities.name: Hermitage Foreshore Track
activities.description: Short bushwalk with harbour views and hidden beaches.

activities.name: Kayaking on Sydney Harbour
activities.description: Paddle together and enjoy the city skyline from the water.

activities.name: Pottery Class at Clay Sydney
activities.description: Get creative and a little messy making pottery together.

activities.name: Picnic at Centennial Park
activities.description: Pack snacks and relax under the trees or by the pond.

activities.name: Observatory Hill Sunset
activities.description: Panoramic views and grassy slopes for a golden-hour moment.
